MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH47 postcode area of Bathgate. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:46pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network outside 14 Mosside Drive and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:39pm on Monday, 29 March 2021
